SELECT NVL(DEPT_CODE, '부서없음') DEPT_CODE, SUM(SALARY) FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) GROUP BY DEPT_CODE ORDER BY DEPT_CODE ASC
